4.saq: Keatae ntoki nabo ake neyiere niyelou neiko Koronapairas

12.saq: Kerasaa ana pairas tanaa kore kullo ldarat

13.saq: Talama: kore tinilamari riot are naaku mikibaki naa lolo darat.

17.saq: Naaku tinidol ltung’ani egira allwa/ nesing’/omwai indim nigelu aas:

18.saq: Nchoo nanka napuyiapui. Keidim nolwuaki ankata esing’aki nia anka neirita lkule enyikita ninye.

22.saq: Keidim aikata naaku momwai, koon ake eripito.

23.saq: Kore ltung’ana etarasutua keidim neitarasaa abaki tanaa melio ajo komoyia ninche.

24.saq: Kore te nkidapash, keisupat piilam ltururi amu miyiolo naa aikata ajo ng’ae omwai.

28.saq: ng’oji naironyi te ntoki nailiepeki nkurupani

32.saq: ankata siake oriong enia anka napuyiapui enkutuk

38.saq: Kake kore aikata keidim nkamulak eltung’ani omwai nodoki ntokitin...

42.saq: Naa kore tinishomo niimbong’ kunna tokitin aikata imiyiolo, nintoki aibung’ nkomom ino,

43.saq: naa kore ake nkoitei nanere puworinye koon naa tununtukoo te saiboni.

44.saq: Keidim ale kukuu nowuon tee ntokitin tenkata naado

51.saq: Mimbung’ nkomoom ino (tanaa nkomoom elikae). Kore tanaa iyeu nimbung’, ntuko angas nkaik te saiboni katukul.

52.saq: Nkata naitosha piirany “mpari eunoto eng’ida” nkatitin are.

58.saq: tenaaku aikata imbung’a, muure. Ntuko ake adake nkaik inono te saiboni.

59.saq: Kore atoki, tanaa keidimai, miimbung’ oriong enia aanka ninchopito te nkutuk.

61.saq: Kobulu naa ale kukuu taatua nia anka tininchop nkata naado.

62.saq: Nturai nia kitambaa enkutuk tenejing lchapu. Minterepaa mpari inchopito!

68.saq: Eming’ar ndaa, mpilipili, lkoombeni anaa sii taulo.

69.saq: Meata nunko tiniseyie nkomoom ino te laideloki abaki tinitasaana.

70.saq: tanaa keidimai, tobolie tanaa nkenie milangoni laideloki tanaa sipi aaku mara nkaik.

74.saq: Ntuko nkaik inono te saiboni nkata pooki.

80.saq: Read the articles for more tips!

81.saq: “This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel” by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)

82.saq: “The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe”, by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign policy, Report. (Jan 25, 2020)

83.saq: “How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands”. By Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, opinion. (Jan 28,2020)

85.saq:
Additional notes: Hygiene precautions in comic are effective in preventing many other common infections such as flu and cold, and should be applied in every day life, even when there is no epidemic. 
References: lnformation in comic is based on understanding of COVID19 up till 28 Feb 2020, and mainly from these three references.  https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.htmlhttps://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/  https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10
Additonal lnformation A PDF version of the comic is available for free download here: https://gumroad.com/weimankowart 
Sharing Guidelines This comic is free for the general public to share online and through Whatsapp and Telegram, and the downloads are free for printing out as posters for personal and educational use in homes, schools, and workplaces. 
When sharing, please remember these 3 points: 1) No edits to the comics is allowed in any way when sharing. 2) Comics cannot be used for any commercial project 3) lf online, credit the creator on FB by tagging @weimankowart, on IG by tagging @weimankow (IG), or providing a link to instagram com/weimankow
For all other uses, please send a request in to: comicsforgood@gmail.com

90.eng: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow

bookText.saq:
Mbaa naipirita koronapairas

Translated by Abednego Lolokuru

Keatae ntoki nabo ake neyiere niyelou neiko Koronapairas
tenarasaa
Nkutuk
Nkume
Nkonyek
tenejing’ atua
ltung’ani bioto
Ltung’ani omwai
Kerasaa ana pairas tanaa kore kullo ldarat
Talama: kore tinilamari riot are naaku mikibaki naa lolo darat.
Nabo
riot are
ottisia!
Naaku tinidol ltung’ani egira allwa/ nesing’/omwai indim nigelu aas:
Nchoo nanka napuyiapui. Keidim nolwuaki ankata esing’aki nia anka neirita lkule enyikita ninye.
are
Ashe oleng “aisugsug”
Tanaa
Keidim aikata naaku momwai, koon ake eripito.
Kore ltung’ana etarasutua keidim neitarasaa abaki tanaa melio ajo komoyia ninche.
Kore te nkidapash, keisupat piilam ltururi amu miyiolo naa aikata ajo ng’ae omwai.
njipet
Ltung’ani bioto
Lgiitan le nkari enkima
ng’oji naironyi te ntoki nailiepeki nkurupani
Tishu
lkoombeni
Mashinini
ankata siake oriong enia anka napuyiapui enkutuk
nkasi enkurupani
ntoki ekompita
Lkalamu
Nkubung’at emilanko
Nkaik enche
Kake kore aikata keidim nkamulak eltung’ani omwai nodoki ntokitin...
indimdim nimwai pookin
tanaa nkomom eltung’ani linchi
ning’ing’i nkonyek
Naa kore tinishomo niimbong’ kunna tokitin aikata imiyiolo, nintoki aibung’ nkomom ino,
naa kore ake nkoitei nanere puworinye koon naa tununtukoo te saiboni.
Keidim ale kukuu nowuon tee ntokitin tenkata naado
saiboni
baa naanere nias
Naaku nia peishiakino tininjipaa kunna
ntuko te saiboni metabaki ene
Saiboni
laideloki
Mimbung’ nkomoom ino (tanaa nkomoom elikae). Kore tanaa iyeu nimbung’, ntuko angas nkaik te saiboni katukul.
Nkata naitosha piirany “mpari eunoto eng’ida” nkatitin are.
atwa laisotok
te sekondi tikitam
Terishet lkumojik
Ntuko oriong enkaik inono
Nyo eji katukul?
tenaaku aikata imbung’a, muure. Ntuko ake adake nkaik inono te saiboni.
Kore atoki, tanaa keidimai, miimbung’ oriong enia aanka ninchopito te nkutuk.
ldarat
Kobulu naa ale kukuu taatua nia anka tininchop nkata naado.
Nturai nia kitambaa enkutuk tenejing lchapu. Minterepaa mpari inchopito!
taashishere lo kijiko liworie ndaa
nkerai
Papa
Yeyio
meata ltungani lemeata taulo enye
Eming’ar ndaa, mpilipili, lkoombeni anaa sii taulo.
Meata nunko tiniseyie nkomoom ino te laideloki abaki tinitasaana.
tanaa keidimai, tobolie tanaa nkenie milangoni laideloki tanaa sipi aaku mara nkaik.
nkang’
oo tinishukunye ichomo boo.
ewon eitu inya ndaa.
Ntuko nkaik inono te saiboni nkata pooki.
kore nikindipie,
saiboni
Airita aate, pookin.
Airita aate, pookin.
saiboni
Read the articles for more tips!

“The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe”, by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign policy, Report. (Jan 25, 2020)

“How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands”. By Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, opinion. (Jan 28,2020)
